sentences.en: "We try to find which parts of the brain preferentially talk to which other parts, " he says. "We can sort of map that out, and at the end it sort of spits out a number.
sentences.cn: “我们希望弄明白大脑中哪些部分优先和哪些部分通信”他说“我们可以从某种程度上将其映射出来，并最终以数字的方式反映出来，这就是“脑龄””。

sentences.en: Ascospore analysis suggested that the fungus is homothallic but will preferentially outcross.
sentences.cn: 从分析子囊孢子的结果看出,此菌能同亲配合,但很易异型杂交.

sentences.en: But for sulphur - sensitized emulsion, the developing centres formed preferentially on the edge of octahedral grain.
sentences.cn: 未敏化乳剂的显影灰雾中心在颗粒表面上的分布是随机的,而硫敏化乳剂的显影灰雾中心则优先在八面体的棱上生成.

sentences.en: Dark Wind's AI preferentially out low - HP minions or champions.
sentences.cn: 黑暗之风的人工智能更喜欢找低HP的小兵或英雄.

sentences.en: Eldest son is preferentially all sister - in - laws on the right of succession.
sentences.cn: 在继承权上长子优先于诸 弟妹.

sentences.en: Heterosexuals should not be treated preferentially when the state carries out that role.
sentences.cn: 当国家执行这个作用的时候不应该优先对待异性恋者。

sentences.en: Molecules in the more tenuous upper atmosphere are preferentially scattering blue light.
sentences.cn: 而上层大气中稀薄的分子更多地是散射蓝光.

sentences.en: Shorterm ( 3 mo ) observational studies indicate undernourished children may preferentially benefit fron breakfast consumption.
sentences.cn: 短期 ( 小于3个月 ) 的观测研究表明营养不良的小孩可能优先得益于吃早餐.

sentences.en: Strong responsibility, team work spirit, working experience in water Heavy Industry field is preferentially considered.
sentences.cn: 工作责任心强, 有团队协作精神, 具有重型机械行业工作经验者优先考虑.

sentences.en: Strong responsibility, team work spirit, working experience in water pump field is preferentially considered.
sentences.cn: 工作责任心强, 有团队协作精神, 具有水泵行业工作经验者优先考虑.

sentences.en: The experimental results show that ammonia molecule is adsorbed preferentially on the B acid sites.
sentences.cn: 实验结果还表明氨分子在B酸中心上优先被吸附.

sentences.en: The long polyunsaturated fatty acids, characteristic of marine oils , are preferentially located at the sn - 2 position.
sentences.cn: 海生动物油的长链为不饱和脂肪酸优先位于sn -2 位.

sentences.en: The surface analysis from XPS indicated that the fluorinated component preferentially self - separation at the film - air interface.
sentences.cn: 通过XPS分析证实了含氟组分通过自分层行为在乳胶膜和空气的界面富集.

sentences.en: Then back in Spain, they trained a strain of Pseudomonas bacteria to preferentially nibble salt blooms.
sentences.cn: 回到西班牙后，他们便培养了一种可以优先吞食盐层的假单胞菌。

sentences.en: Tortoises seem to preferentially put the available calcium in the plastron.
sentences.cn: 龟们似乎更喜欢把可用的钙质添加到他们的胸甲中.

sentences.en: When horses and donkeys pasture together each species mates preferentially with its own kind.
sentences.cn: 当马和驴一起吃草时,每个物种还是会优先和自己的种类呆在一起的.

words.tran_cn: 优先的；选择的；特惠的；先取的
